pos{time: T, y: Y} :-
  startPos{time: T, y: Y} |
  stepPos{time: T, y: Y}.
startPos{time: 1, y: 0}.
stepPos{time: T, y: NewPos} :-
  T > 1 &
  PrevTime + 1 = T &
  pos{time: PrevTime, y: PrevPos} &
  PrevPos + 3 = NewPos.
